channel.title: maven on rmoff's random ramblings

item.title: UnsupportedClassVersionError: `<x>` has been compiled by a more recent version of the Java Runtime
item.description: This article is just for Googlers and my future self encountering this error. Recently I was building a Docker image from the ksqlDB code base, and whilst it built successfully the ksqlDB server process in the Docker container when instantiated failed with a UnsupportedClassVersionError:
